projects.title: Ticketing Komplain
projects.description: A robust full-stack issue tracking system. Features streamlined complaint submission, real-time status updates, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for efficient resolution management.

projects.title: Sekolah 3T
projects.description: A crowdfunding platform dedicated to empowering schools in 3T regions. Ensures transparent fundraising and verified infrastructure development using modern web technologies.

projects.title: Warmindo Telkom (Warkom)
projects.description: A comprehensive Point of Sale (POS) and inventory system for computer retail. Optimized to handle stock tracking, sales reporting, and business analytics seamlessly.

projects.title: Dayly
projects.description: A productivity-focused utility suite for managing dates and schedules. Features precise age calculation, work day estimation, and event tracking in a modern interface.

projects.title: Cikal Tas
projects.description: An elegant digital product catalog designed for Cikal Tas. Focuses on immersive user experience (UX) and visual storytelling to showcase products effectively.

projects.title: HydroSupport
projects.description: A user-centric mobile solution developed to streamline access to clean water resources. Facilitates efficient support distribution for communities in need.
